text: “Nde maaŋ muuŋgip bigɨnan bigi sosuagi gumgir nɨɨn saŋv, nde mba gumgi mbari Fhe Bakɨmen buni mbararagi pheni gum tuavi rɨksɨgivigen mbui tɨvar muuŋv, guma the suaŋrim, ana mbarɨva biv nde nɨman fhara ŋgɨ thari. Mba tɨva mbui gumgi, mbe fhura bigi shɨshɨgi, mbe maaŋ muuŋrim, mbe gumgi gu mbigi, mbe ganɨv khaŋ mbe suanga mbe tɨvar vhuuŋ mbui ntɨɨri ma. Mbe maaŋ mbe suaŋv mbe zɨri ndiv vun kuamkuar zav, mbe maaŋ mbui. Maaŋ mbui gumgi, gu guigira khar nde nzuai, mbe za won vheza ndigi.
